text: Hard Hunted is a 1993 American action adventure movie directed by Andy Sidaris and starring Bruce Penhall, Geoffrey Moore, Cynthia Brimhall, Chu Chu Malave, Dona Speir, Roberta Vasquez, Becky Mullen. It was distributed by Malibu Bay Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1993 action movies Category:1993 adventure movies Category:American action movies Category:American adventure movies
title: Hard Hunted
